participant_1.background:
I went to a local metal show for my last birthday.
i was the first test child for sesame street.
i have a farm with pigs , horses and hens.
my favorite pizza is pepperoni.
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.

participant_2.background:
I have light brown hair that I usually wear in a ponytail.
My parents are loving and supportive, even if they don't always understand my choices.
i love to take road trips.
I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere.
i am good at throwing parties.

content.text: Good, good! Just got home from a road trip, how about you?
Ah that's awesome! I'm going to a metal show on my birthday this weekend, how do you feel about heavy metal?
I'm not really into it, but I can appreciate the art form!
That's fair, it's not for everyone. I love the energy of it, and the way it makes me feel.
I can definitely see the appeal! I'm more into classic rock and alternative music.
Oh cool, me too! I also like a lot of indie and folk music.
That's awesome! I love discovering new music, and I'm always looking for new recommendations.
Me too! I'm always happy to share music I love with people, so feel free to ask me anytime.
Thanks, I will! I'm always looking for new ways to expand my musical horizons.
No problem! I'm glad we could chat, have a great rest of your day!
You too! Thanks for the conversation
